VIRefNum Methods

Requires: Base Development System

Inherits from Generic»GObject»Control»RefNum»LVObjectRefNum. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Make Non-Strict ReferenceConverts the VI reference into a non-strict VI reference. Details
Make Strict ReferenceUses the connector pane pattern of the specified VI to convert the VI reference into a strict VI reference. Details
Set ConpaneSets the connector pane of a VI. Details
